name: Tagliolini di montagna deliziosi
desc: Noodles in a meat and vegetable sauce. The seemingly ordinary noodles have absorbed the essence of the mountainous delicacies. A single mouthful is enough to taste its extreme freshness.

value.name: Ricetta: Tagliolini di montagna
value.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Noodles with Mountain Delicacies.

value.name: Fungo
value.desc: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

value.name: Pezzo di carne cruda
value.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

value.name: Farina
value.desc: Una polvere ottenuta macinando il frumento. In qualunque modo venga utilizzata, soddisfa il palato di ogni commensale.

value.name: Tagliolini di montagna
value.desc: Noodles in a meat and vegetable sauce. The sauce has a rustic flavor, and there's a generous amount of it mixed in with the noodles. A humble but enduringly popular dish.

value.name: Tagliolini di montagna sospetti
value.desc: Noodles in a meat and vegetable sauce. The moisture has been sucked right out of this dish, causing the noodles to become dry. You might choke on them even if you chew slowly.
